    Get past recommendations for an app, optionally specified by the time range.

    Task<AzureOperationResponse<IList<Recommendation>>> ListHistoryForWebAppWithHttpMessagesAsync(string resourceGroupName, string siteName, string filter = null, Dictionary<string, List<string>> customHeaders = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function ListHistoryForWebAppWithHttpMessagesAsync(resourceGroupName As String, siteName As String, filter As String = Nothing, customHeaders As Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)) = Nothing, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of AzureOperationResponse(Of IList(Of Recommendation)))

    Parameters

      String
      String

      Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

    • siteName
      String
      String

      Name of the app.

    • filter
      String
      String

      Filter is specified by using OData syntax. Example: $filter=channels eq 'Api' or channel eq 'Notification' and startTime eq '2014-01-01T00:00:00Z' and endTime eq '2014-12-31T23:59:59Z' and timeGrain eq duration'[PT1H|PT1M|P1D]

    • customHeaders
      Dictionary<String, List<String>>
      Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String))

      The headers that will be added to request.

      CancellationToken

      Microsoft.Rest.SerializationException

    Get past recommendations for an app, optionally specified by the time range.

    ListRecommendedRulesForWebAppWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, Nullable(Of Boolean), String, Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

    Get all recommendations for an app.

    Task<AzureOperationResponse<IList<Recommendation>>> ListRecommendedRulesForWebAppWithHttpMessagesAsync(string resourceGroupName, string siteName, bool ? featured = null, string filter = null, Dictionary<string, List<string>> customHeaders = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function ListRecommendedRulesForWebAppWithHttpMessagesAsync(resourceGroupName As String, siteName As String, featured As Boolean? = Nothing, filter As String = Nothing, customHeaders As Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)) = Nothing, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of AzureOperationResponse(Of IList(Of Recommendation)))

    Parameters

    • resourceGroupName
      String
      String

      Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

    • siteName
      String
      String

      Name of the app.

    • featured
      Nullable<Boolean>
      Nullable(Of Boolean)

      Specify <code>true</code> to return only the most critical recommendations. The default is <code>false</code>, which returns all recommendations.

    • filter
      String
      String

      Return only channels specified in the filter. Filter is specified by using OData syntax. Example: $filter=channels eq 'Api' or channel eq 'Notification'

    • customHeaders
      Dictionary<String, List<String>>
      Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String))

      The headers that will be added to request.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The cancellation token.

    Returns

    • Task<Microsoft.Rest.Azure.AzureOperationResponse<IList<Recommendation>>>
      Task(Of Microsoft.Rest.Azure.AzureOperationResponse(Of IList(Of Recommendation)))

      Microsoft.Rest.Azure.CloudException

      Thrown when the operation returned an invalid status code

    • Microsoft.Rest.SerializationException
      Microsoft.Rest.SerializationException

      Thrown when unable to deserialize the response

    • Microsoft.Rest.ValidationException
      Microsoft.Rest.ValidationException

      Thrown when a required parameter is null

    Remarks

    Get all recommendations for an app.
